With this header, `uv` automatically creates and manages a dedicated virtual environment for your script.

```python
#!/usr/bin/env -S uv run --script
# /// script
# requires-python = ">=3.13"
# dependencies = [
#     "package-name>=1.0.0",
#     "another-package",
# ]
# ///

# Rest of the script...
```
